The owner, Ji Hyun, is one of the kindest I've met in my 14 years in Korea. Although she doesn't speak English, she showed her kindness in many ways. As an Irishman, I always appreciated the free potatoes as a sidedish to the traditional teas. Paying by cash was one of the ways this place stays old fashioned. It was the perfect place for a date or private chat. I hope she and this delightful teahouse never change!
